description.value:
Weapons with this rune empower your strength, and attacks with these weapons leave your foe staggered. When you critically hit a target with this weapon, your target becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Clumsy]{Clumsy 1} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Enfeebled]{Enfeebled 1} until the end of your next turn.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.Item.Effect: Crushing]

publication.title: Pathfinder Lost Omens: The Grand Bazaar
